plot: After Monroe's (Silas Weir Mitchell) abduction by the Wesenrein, Nick (David Giuntoli) gathers the whole team, including Wu (Reggie Lee), to track him down and return him to Rosalee (Bree Turner). As the search intensifies, Juliette (Bitsie Tulloch) learns more about her new reality as a Hexenbiest.

Grandmaster Riken's Wesenrein chapter conducts a KK-style 'trial' against 'degenerated' Monroe, which obviously can only end in another bloody death sentence. Nick and Renard enlist Wu, still being initiated, into the hasty search for Monroe. The trail of 'mole' cop Acker leads trough the prisoner he visited to his scary former cellmate: Riken. Renard warns Juliette he may not be able to undo the remaining Adalind-like Hexenbiest-mode-effects for her of Nick's cure.—KGF Vissers
